nba_main_dataframe.description: Contains per-game advanced statistics for NBA players, including shooting, rebounding, playmaking, and game context metrics.

columns.name: dist_feet
columns.description: Distance (in feet) related to the play (e.g., shot distance).

columns.name: game_date
columns.description: Date and time when the game was played.

columns.name: post_touch_pts
columns.description: Points scored after receiving a post touch.

columns.name: starter
columns.description: Indicator if the player was in the starting lineup.

columns.name: playoffs
columns.description: Indicator if the game was a playoff game.

columns.name: regular_season
columns.description: Indicator if the game was a regular season game.

columns.name: home
columns.description: Indicator for a home game (e.g., 1 for home, 0 for away).

nba_play_by_play.description: Contains play-by-play details for NBA games, capturing in-game events and player actions.

columns.name: game_date
columns.description: Date and time of the game.

columns.name: regular_season
columns.description: Indicator for a regular season game.

columns.name: fga
columns.description: Field goal attempts during the play.

columns.name: fgm
columns.description: Field goals made during the play.

columns.name: fta
columns.description: Free throw attempts during the play.

columns.name: ftm
columns.description: Free throws made during the play.

columns.name: pf
columns.description: Personal fouls recorded during the play.

columns.name: shooter_player_name
columns.description: Name of the shooter involved in the play.

columns.name: assist_player_name
columns.description: Name of the player credited with an assist.

columns.name: rebound_player_name
columns.description: Name of the player who secured the rebound.

columns.name: defender_player_name
columns.description: Name of the defender involved in the play.

columns.name: possession_team_name
columns.description: Name of the team in possession during the play.

nfl_main_df.description: Contains per-game statistics for NFL players, including passing, rushing, receiving, and game context data.

columns.name: sack_yards
columns.description: Total yards lost due to sacks.

columns.name: passing_epa
columns.description: Expected points added from passing plays.

columns.name: rushing_epa
columns.description: Expected points added from rushing plays.

columns.name: receiving_yards_after_catch
columns.description: Yards gained after the catch on receiving plays.

columns.name: receiving_epa
columns.description: Expected points added from receiving plays.

columns.name: opponent_team
columns.description: Abbreviation or identifier for the opponent team.

columns.name: opponent_team_name
columns.description: Full name of the opponent team.

columns.name: stadium
columns.description: Name of the stadium where the game was played.

columns.name: game_date
columns.description: Date and time of the game.

columns.name: game_type
columns.description: Type of the game (e.g., regular season, playoff).

columns.name: weekday
columns.description: Day of the week the game was played.

columns.name: home
columns.description: Indicator if the team was playing at home.

columns.name: playoffs
columns.description: Indicator if the game was a playoff game.

columns.name: qb_hit_pass_attempts
columns.description: Pass attempts where the QB was hit.

columns.name: qb_hit_completions
columns.description: Pass completions when the QB was hit.

columns.name: right_pass_attempts
columns.description: Pass attempts directed to the right.

columns.name: middle_pass_attempts
columns.description: Pass attempts directed through the middle.

columns.name: left_pass_attempts
columns.description: Pass attempts directed to the left.

columns.name: longest_completion
columns.description: Longest pass completion in the game.

columns.name: right_receptions
columns.description: Receptions made on the right side.

columns.name: left_receptions
columns.description: Receptions made on the left side.

nfl_play_by_play.description: Contains detailed, down-by-down play data for NFL games, including various tactical and game situation metrics.

columns.name: playoffs
columns.description: Indicator if the play occurred during the playoffs.

columns.name: week
columns.description: Week number of the NFL season.

columns.name: possession_home
columns.description: Indicator if the home team was in possession.

columns.name: yards_to_endzone
columns.description: Yards remaining to reach the end zone.

columns.name: game_date
columns.description: Date and time of the game.

columns.name: quarter_seconds_remaining
columns.description: Seconds remaining in the current quarter.

columns.name: yards_to_fist_down
columns.description: Yards needed for a first down.

columns.name: shotgun
columns.description: Indicator if the play was executed from a shotgun formation.

columns.name: no_huddle
columns.description: Indicator if the play was run without a huddle.

columns.name: touchdown_team_name
columns.description: Name of the team that scored a touchdown.

columns.name: possession_team_score
columns.description: Score of the team in possession.

columns.name: score_differential
columns.description: Score differential at the time of the play.

columns.name: first_down_rush
columns.description: Indicator if a first down was achieved via rushing.

columns.name: first_down_pass
columns.description: Indicator if a first down was achieved via passing.

columns.name: first_down_penalty
columns.description: Indicator if a penalty resulted in a first down.

columns.name: third_down_converted
columns.description: Indicator if third down was successfully converted.

columns.name: third_down_failed
columns.description: Indicator if the third down attempt failed.

columns.name: fourth_down_converted
columns.description: Indicator if fourth down was successfully converted.

columns.name: fourth_down_failed
columns.description: Indicator if the fourth down attempt failed.

columns.name: interception
columns.description: Indicator if an interception occurred on the play.

columns.name: safety
columns.description: Indicator if a safety was recorded.

columns.name: penalty
columns.description: Indicator if a penalty occurred on the play.

columns.name: tackled_for_loss
columns.description: Indicator if the play resulted in a loss due to a tackle.

columns.name: qb_hit
columns.description: Indicator if the quarterback was hit on the play.

columns.name: pass_attempt
columns.description: Number of pass attempts on the play.

columns.name: pass_touchdown
columns.description: Indicator if a passing touchdown was scored.

columns.name: rush_touchdown
columns.description: Indicator if a rushing touchdown was scored.

columns.name: return_touchdown
columns.description: Indicator if a return touchdown was scored.

columns.name: field_goal_attempt
columns.description: Indicator if a field goal was attempted.

columns.name: kickoff_attempt
columns.description: Indicator if a kickoff was attempted.

columns.name: punt_attempt
columns.description: Indicator if a punt was attempted.

columns.name: complete_pass
columns.description: Indicator if a pass was completed.

columns.name: penalty_team_name
columns.description: Name of the team that committed the penalty.

columns.name: right_rush
columns.description: Rush attempts directed to the right.

columns.name: middle_rush
columns.description: Rush attempts directed through the middle.

columns.name: left_rush
columns.description: Rush attempts directed to the left.

columns.name: right_pass_attempt
columns.description: Pass attempts directed to the right.

columns.name: left_pass_attempt
columns.description: Pass attempts directed to the left.

columns.name: roof
columns.description: Indicator for roof type or status.

columns.name: first_down
columns.description: Indicator if a first down was achieved.

columns.name: defenders_in_box
columns.description: Number of defenders in the box during the play.

columns.name: time_to_throw
columns.description: Time taken for the quarterback to throw the ball.

columns.name: defense_zone_coverage
columns.description: Indicator for zone coverage by defense.

columns.name: defense_man_coverage
columns.description: Indicator for man-to-man coverage by defense.

columns.name: passer_name
columns.description: Name of the player passing the ball.

columns.name: receiver_name
columns.description: Name of the player receiving the ball.

columns.name: rusher_name
columns.description: Name of the player rushing the ball.

columns.name: touchdown_player_name
columns.description: Name of the player scoring a touchdown.

columns.name: possession_team_name
columns.description: Name of the team in possession.

columns.name: drive_time_of_possession_in_seconds
columns.description: Duration of the drive in seconds.

sportgpt_results.description: Contains results and related metadata from SportGPT queries.

mlb_pitching_dataframe.description: Contains per-game pitching statistics for MLB pitchers.

columns.name: game_date
columns.description: Date and time of the game.

columns.name: starter
columns.description: Indicator if the pitcher was the starter.

columns.name: balls_in_play_allowed
columns.description: Balls put in play against the pitcher.

columns.name: home
columns.description: Indicator if the game was played at home.

mlb_batting_dataframe.description: Contains per-game batting statistics for MLB batters.

columns.name: game_date
columns.description: Date and time of the game.

columns.name: home
columns.description: Indicator if the game was played at home.

columns.name: grounded_into_double_play
columns.description: Number of double plays grounded into.

columns.name: bunt_grounds_out
columns.description: Bunts resulting in a ground out.

plate_appearance_dataframe.description: Contains data for each plate appearance in MLB games, capturing pitch release and batter outcomes.

columns.name: game_date
columns.description: Date and time of the game.

columns.name: game_type
columns.description: Type of game (e.g., regular season, playoffs).

columns.name: balls
columns.description: Number of balls in the count.

columns.name: strikes
columns.description: Number of strikes in the count.

columns.name: runner_on_3b
columns.description: Indicator if a runner is on third base.

columns.name: runner_on_2b
columns.description: Indicator if a runner is on second base.

columns.name: runner_on_1b
columns.description: Indicator if a runner is on first base.

columns.name: outs_when_up
columns.description: Number of outs when the batter comes to the plate.

columns.name: inning_topbot
columns.description: Indicator for the top or bottom of the inning.

columns.name: batted_ball_distance
columns.description: Distance the ball traveled when hit.

columns.name: batted_ball_exit_velocity
columns.description: Exit velocity of the batted ball.

columns.name: batted_ball_launch_angle
columns.description: Launch angle of the batted ball.

columns.name: pitch_name
columns.description: Name or type of the pitch.

columns.name: runs_scored
columns.description: Runs scored on the plate appearance.

columns.name: pitcher_home
columns.description: Indicator if the pitcher’s team was home.

columns.name: batter_home
columns.description: Indicator if the batter’s team was home.

columns.name: venue_name
columns.description: Venue where the game was played.

columns.name: balls_in_play
columns.description: Number of balls put in play.

columns.name: starter
columns.description: Indicator if the pitcher was a starter.

columns.name: rbi
columns.description: Runs batted in on the plate appearance.

columns.name: grounded_into_double_play
columns.description: Indicator if a double play was grounded into.

columns.name: hit_by_pitch
columns.description: Indicator if the batter was hit by a pitch.

columns.name: sac_bunt
columns.description: Indicator if a sacrifice bunt occurred.

columns.name: singles
columns.description: Number of singles hit in the plate appearance.

columns.name: doubles
columns.description: Number of doubles hit in the plate appearance.

columns.name: triples
columns.description: Number of triples hit in the plate appearance.

columns.name: hr
columns.description: Number of home runs hit in the plate appearance.

columns.name: h
columns.description: Total hits in the plate appearance.

columns.name: intentional_walk
columns.description: Indicator if an intentional walk was issued.

columns.name: swinging_strikeout
columns.description: Indicator if the batter swung and missed for a strikeout.

columns.name: called_strikeout
columns.description: Indicator if the batter was called for a strikeout.

columns.name: sac_fly
columns.description: Indicator if a sacrifice fly occurred.

pitch_dataframe.description: Contains per-pitch data for MLB games, detailing pitch characteristics and outcomes.

columns.name: game_date
columns.description: Date and time of the game.

columns.name: release_speed
columns.description: Speed of the pitch at release (MPH).

columns.name: game_type
columns.description: Type of game (e.g., regular season, playoffs).

columns.name: balls_count
columns.description: Count of balls during the pitch.

columns.name: strikes_count
columns.description: Count of strikes during the pitch.

columns.name: runner_on_3b
columns.description: Indicator if a runner is on third base.

columns.name: runner_on_2b
columns.description: Indicator if a runner is on second base.

columns.name: runner_on_1b
columns.description: Indicator if a runner is on first base.

columns.name: outs_when_up
columns.description: Number of outs when the pitch was thrown.

columns.name: inning_topbot
columns.description: Indicates whether it is the top or bottom of the inning.

columns.name: pitch_name
columns.description: Name or type of the pitch (e.g., fastball, slider).

columns.name: pitcher_home
columns.description: Indicator if the pitcher's team was home.

columns.name: batter_home
columns.description: Indicator if the batter's team was home.

columns.name: venue_name
columns.description: Venue where the game was played.

columns.name: balls_in_play
columns.description: Number of balls put in play.

columns.name: starter
columns.description: Indicator if the pitcher was a starter.

columns.name: strike
columns.description: Indicator if the pitch was a strike.

columns.name: ball
columns.description: Indicator if the pitch was a ball.

columns.name: called_strike
columns.description: Indicator if the pitch was a called strike.

columns.name: swinging_strike
columns.description: Indicator if the pitch resulted in a swinging strike.

columns.name: fouls
columns.description: Number of fouls committed on the pitch.

columns.name: swings
columns.description: Number of swings at the pitch.
